definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: There were times when the Germans became suspicious, and she was even interviewed by the Gestapo.
sentences.chinese: 德国人有时起疑，盖世太保甚至找她问话。

sentences.english: Listen to cost no intentionally query words, quickly elevated heaved eye Pie the east of the eye brocade.
sentences.chinese: 听着花无心的问话，急忙抬眼瞥了眼东方锦。

sentences.english: The man was asking, grammar wavering.
' was the constant question in her mouth.
sentences.chinese: 这是常挂在她嘴边的问话。

sentences.english: The boy's reply to his teacher was bordering on rudeness.
sentences.chinese: 那男学生回答教师的问话时态度近乎粗鲁。

sentences.english: The questions of the driver had the tone of a subtle examination .
sentences.chinese: 司机的问话都含有盘问的口吻。

sentences.english: It was only a simple question, but one I have never been able to forget.
sentences.chinese: 这只不过是一句简单的问话，但却让我无法忘怀。

sentences.english: Sometimes the last thing I want to hear is “What’s for dinner?”.
sentences.chinese: 有时我最怕听到“晚饭吃什么”的问话。

sentences.english: Dozens of people from Salem and other Massachusetts villages were brought in for questioning.
sentences.chinese: 萨勒姆和马萨诸塞其他村子的很多人，都被带去问话。

sentences.english: Go and carry my message,' he interrupted impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 他不耐烦地打断了我的问话。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I wear ear plugs, did not catch your questioning.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，刚才我戴着耳塞，没听清您的问话。

sentences.english: Being stopped by militsiya was a regular occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 被警察拦住问话是家常便饭。

sentences.english: The police detained several suspects for questioning.
sentences.chinese: 警察扣留了几个嫌疑犯问话。
我们能分辨出一些问话和一些答话。

sentences.english: Former ministers are called to account for their behavior.
sentences.chinese: 前任政府部长可以被招来问话，解释他们的所作所为。
